<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Menu

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets data into menu entry on given path.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[menuSetData]] [idc, path, data]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> path: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> data: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control [[menuSetData]] [path, data]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> data: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value>  [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value>  <Code>[[findDisplay]] 313 [[displayCtrl]] 120 [[menuSetData]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[0, 1], "<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[[true]], [[player]], 'Hello World!', 1337]"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[menuData]]
</value></part></template>
